headline: Lockheed Martin and Department of War Advance Landmark Acquisition Transformation to Accelerate PAC-3® MSE Production
summary: Lockheed Martin (NYSE: LMT) signed a landmark framework agreement with the U.S. Department of War to rapidly accelerate the production and delivery of PAC-3® Missile Segment Enhancement (MSE) interceptors. This transformative partnership, designed to deliver sustained production at scale, will increase annual capacity from approximately 600 to 2,000 in a seven-year agreement, supporting U.S. forces, allies and partner nations.

headline: Did Surging Backlog And Geopolitical Demand Just Shift Lockheed Martin's (LMT) Investment Narrative?
summary: Lockheed Martin recently benefited from heightened investor attention after past U.S. military strikes in Venezuela and renewed focus on key programs such as the F-35, missile defense, and space systems, alongside major contract wins that expanded its record order backlog. The combination of real-world combat use of its platforms, large-scale operations involving its aircraft, and a growing backlog underscores how geopolitical shocks can quickly reinforce Lockheed Martin’s role in advanced...
